last_episode_to_air.name: Psychic Kids Investigates: The Lost Girl
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nicole is a 17-year-old girl who communicates with spirits and is traumatized by them. She says the spirits want something from her but she doesn't know what that is. Ryan is a 16-year-old boy who has premonitions of tragic events and knows details about people without having met them. Sensitive Chris Fleming and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Nicole and Ryan to a psychic teenager they've worked with before. Since appearing on Psychic Kids Vicki has been using her abilities to help the police in her hometown. With Vicki as a mentor, these teens apply their psychic skills to a missing persons case and work with detectives in New York to generate leads on a teenager who disappeared.

name: Psychic Kids
overview:
Psychic Kids: Children of the Paranormal is a paranormal television series broadcast on the A&E television network. Hosted by Chip Coffey, an American psychic investigator, with Edy Nathan, Chris Fleming, and Kim Russo, the show brings together children who report having psychic abilities with adult psychic/mediums, with the stated purpose of "show[ing] them how to harness their abilities and, ultimately, [showing] them that they're not alone in this world". The series debuted in summer 2008 with a premiere episode entitled "Fear Management." Later episodes feature content in correlation with another A&E paranormal series Coffey has appeared on, Paranormal State, with Ryan Buell. The show has been renewed twice, with its second season premiering on December 15, 2009, and the third season premiering on October 17, 2010, both on A&E.

A&E aired an episode of Biographies called "Psychic Children" about children and young people with the same alleged abilities described in the show.

Psychic Kids has been criticized for exploiting children.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Freddie
episodes.overview: Faith, an 8-year-old girl, sees the ghost of a young boy named Freddy. Next, Chip and Lisa help Faith overcome her fear of talking about her visions.

episodes.name: Fear Management
episodes.overview: Chip and Lisa visit Joel, an isolated 14-year-old boy who sees the spirits of people and animals on his remote California ranch. Joel has never told anyone other than his mother about his experiences, he is terrified and desperately wants to know why these things are happening to him. To help Joel, Chip and Lisa introduce him to two siblings and their parents. Morgan, a 10-year-old girl who has premonitions of natural disasters, and Brad, 13, who can feel the pain of spirits around him. Together, the three kids must learn to face their fears when Chip takes them on a ghost hunt of a haunted ranch.

episodes.name: The Demon House
episodes.overview: Alexa, 14, and her family recently abandoned their Florida home because they believe a negative and even dangerous paranormal presence is there. Alexa, who is visited by spirits regularly, is terrified of the house and refuses to return alone. Chip and Lisa introduce Alexa to Hailey, a 12 year-old from Texas who is equally frightened by the spirit of a man she sees on a regular basis, along with a "cursed" mirror she bought at a flea market. In order to confront their fear of the unknown, the girls visit Alexa's house in the most frightening Psychic Kids to date.

episodes.name: Night Terrors
episodes.overview: An 8-year-old girl, who is visited by numerous spirits, travels with her family to a ranch in Arizona to confront her fears.

episodes.name: Angels and Demons
episodes.overview: Ashley lives a life in fear after a horned spirit told her she would die in a car accident; Chip and Lisa introduce Ashley to Dalton, also conflicted with premonitions.

episodes.name: The Missing Person
episodes.overview: Medium Chip Coffey and Dr. Lisa Miller visit with a 15-year-old who is struggling with her father's skepticism about her abilities.

episodes.name: Vanished
episodes.overview: Two teenage girls, Caitlyn and Tori, are haunted by spirits and terrified by nightmares that come true. They are desperate to be assured they are not alone in experiencing these phenomena.

episodes.name: Family Secrets
episodes.overview: Peri and Devon, two teens, explore a haunted whaling ship in order to overcome their fears of encountering spirits.

episodes.name: Ghost School
episodes.overview: Tammy, 15-years-old, along with the help of Alexandra, 17-years-old, must face the "Lady in the Mirror" a spirit that torments her virtually every night.

episodes.name: Crossing Over
episodes.overview: Social outcasts, Olivia and Hailey, discover friendship and the power to overcome their fears of the paranormal. A startling discovery validates both Hailey's and Olivia's abilities to see spirits.

episodes.name: Demon in the Mirror
episodes.overview: 13-year-olds, Bryson and Colt, join a paranormal investigation of a century-old haunted opera house. The boys struggle to be accepted by their dads who doubt their abilities.

episodes.name: Haunted Attic
episodes.overview: Three pre-teens, Hannah, Savanah, and Shauniece team up to help a woman contact her deceased father. Along the way each girl discovers new psychic talents they never knew they had.

episodes.name: Terror in the Night
episodes.overview: Teens, Travis and Vicki, team up with a professional private investigator on a real world missing persons case. Their psychic hits shed new light and hope on the case.

episodes.name: Spirits Among Us
episodes.overview: Mother and daughter psychics, Caprice and Jordi, along with two teen psychic sisters, Peyton and Riley, attempt to solve the puzzle of a mysterious girl ghost at an inn dating to the revolutionary war.

episodes.name: Banishing Evil
episodes.overview: 12-year-old Nick is tormented by an evil spirit named Mr. Rosenberg. Since Rosenberg entered his life, Nick has been plagued by violent nightmares and physical attacks. He lives in constant fear and his only desire is to be a "normal kid." Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Nick to Anissa, an 11-year-old girl who is so frightened by the ghosts and spirits that surround her that she hasn't been able to sleep alone for as long as she can remember. Nick and Anissa work to develop the strength and confidence to keep evil entities at bay, and ultimately they try to banish Mr. Rosenberg.

episodes.name: Psychic Kids Investigates: The Lost Girl
episodes.overview: Brad is an 18-year-old boy who is tormented by evil spirits and dark premonitions that have come true. Brad's parents believe he is being summoned by the devil and refuse to support his abilities. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Brad to 15-year-old Santana, who is traumatized by her ability to see past events through her sense of touch. Both kids want to overcome their fears and use their psychic abilities to help people. They get the chance to participate in a missing person investigation and try to find a teenage girl from Florida who disappeared without a trace

episodes.name: Bloody Maryland
episodes.overview: Alana is a 13-year-old medical intuitive who is haunted by spirits wherever she goes. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce her to Olivia, a 16-year-old girl who is petrified by the spirits that come to her at night. The girls meet in Maryland to face their fears, but while exploring the Landon House, site of Civil War deaths, they are overwhelmed by negative spirits. They leave that night and stay at another inn, where they work on managing their abilities and help a woman who longs to contact her dead children. Ultimately though, they must return to the Landon House and face their biggest fears.

episodes.name: The Disappearance
episodes.overview: 15-year-old Alex has suffered physical attacks by negative spirits that have sent him to the emergency room. Sensitive Chris Fleming and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Alex to 17-year-old Jennifer who is plagued by the spirits she sees daily. She's unable to share her deep fears with her family, which makes her feel isolated. Both kids long to control their abilities and use them in a positive way. They get the chance when they join local authorities in a missing person investigation, gathering psychic information about a teenage boy who walked away from a park in Texas and has not been seen since.

episodes.name: The House of Spirits
episodes.overview: 12-year-old Olivia is terrified by the dark spirits that haunt her home. She believes that her house is a portal for evil spirits, but has no idea that her parents have kept a secret about the house from her. Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Olivia to 11-year-old Amy who communicates with the spirits of her ancestors. Amy is too scared to sleep without her mother, which has created upheaval in her family. With Chip and Edy's guidance, both girls work to fight their fear and hone their psychic skills. They'll need all their abilities to face the final challenge: returning to deal with Olivia's haunted home.

episodes.name: Messages from the Dead: The Lizzie Borden Case
episodes.overview: Megan is a 15-year-old girl who receives messages from the dead but is terrified to deliver them to the loved ones of the spirits who speak to her. Sensitive Chris Fleming and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Megan to 17-year-old Brittany, who is dealing with the physical illness she feels from encountering spirits. Psychic/Medium Kim Russo joins in to teach the girls about receiving messages from beyond. Ultimately Megan and Brittany travel to Lizzie Borden's house, the site of two murders. There, Megan has to face her fear of delivering messages and see if she can learn what really happened in that house from the spirits within.

episodes.name: Psychic Kids Investigates: The Lost Girl
episodes.overview: Nicole is a 17-year-old girl who communicates with spirits and is traumatized by them. She says the spirits want something from her but she doesn't know what that is. Ryan is a 16-year-old boy who has premonitions of tragic events and knows details about people without having met them. Sensitive Chris Fleming and therapist Edy Nathan introduce Nicole and Ryan to a psychic teenager they've worked with before. Since appearing on Psychic Kids Vicki has been using her abilities to help the police in her hometown. With Vicki as a mentor, these teens apply their psychic skills to a missing persons case and work with detectives in New York to generate leads on a teenager who disappeared.
